| Overview             = 
The '''Royal Navy (RN)''' is the [[United Kingdom]]'s naval warfare force. It is the oldest of the UK's armed services, it is known as the Senior Service. The Royal Navy is part of [[Her Majesty's Naval Service (Earth-616)|Her Majesty's Naval Service]], which also includes the [[Royal Marines (Earth-616)|Royal Marines]]. The professional head of the Naval Service is the First Sea Lord who is an admiral and member of the [[Defence Council of the United Kingdom (Earth-616)|Defence Council of the United Kingdom]]. 
| History                 = 

===[[World War II]]===
At the start of World War II in 1939, the Royal Navy was the largest in the world. It was the UK leading defence force against the [[National Socialist German Workers Party (Earth-616)|Nazi]]'s and the other [[Axis (WWII) (Earth-616)|Axis]] powers. The encountered a merchant sailor; [[Barnabus Mullen (Earth-616)|Barnabus Mullen]] during his dangerous trip from [[Portugal]] to the [[Netherlands]].{{r|Daring Mystery Comics Vol 1 1}}
